mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET ACONDITION = 'N' WHERE ANO = #{ano}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, P.PTITLE, T.TTITLE, S.SMCONTENT FROM ALARM A LEFT OUTER JOIN PROJECT P ON (A.APNO = P.PNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN TASK T ON (A.ATNO = T.TNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE_MATCHING S ON (A.ASMNO = S.SMNO) WHERE A.AMNO = #{mno} AND A.ACONDITION = 'Y'
